1_1KdVeashoiPjj79tVUmAy8cBYjwxfZNe1e.body: Hi everyone. Actualy, I don't have any (properly said) favourite videogame. Maybe Gone Home because it's soundtrack or Left 4 Dead 2 because of it's incredible modder comunity. I have a Youtube chanel in the other side of the internet (lol that sounds kind of creepy) where I talk about all this stuff. It's name is Crítica y Videojuegos (Yep, I'm Spanish, sorry). If you wanna take a look just do it and if not, I'm gonna open a blog or something like that in a near future... Just saying XD

1_1HMRzb6FeATsL87krzdUSNZEcYMA8t6RG2.body: Holap, parece que en esto del lado "oscuro" de la web los españoles tenemos nuestro mundillo. Estamos creando una buena fanbase en Zeronet.
